pullRequest.title: Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.0
Still work in progress.
depends on #2716.

commit.message: Fix ClassNotFoundException due to deleted HealthStatusHttpMapper in Spring Boot 2.3.0

nodes.bodyText:
Since Spring Boot 2.3.0, the dependency libraries info included in spring-boot has been changed.
spring-boot doesn't have dependency libraries and version.
I guess we need to refer to spring-boot-dependencies.
2.2.7:

https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot/2.2.7.RELEASE
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-dependencies/2.2.7.RELEASE
https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/blob/v2.2.7.RELEASE/spring-boot-project/spring-boot-dependencies/pom.xml

2.3.0:

https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot/2.3.0.RELEASE
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-dependencies/2.3.0.RELEASE
https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/blob/v2.3.0.RELEASE/spring-boot-project/spring-boot-dependencies/build.gradle

If I don't add dependency-management-plugin, can't compile due to the following error.
Since Spring Boot Gradle Plugin 2.3.0, it has not dependency libraries info.
So I guess we need to add dependency-management-plugin.
2.2.7:
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-gradle-plugin/2.2.7.RELEASE
2.3.0:
https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.springframework.boot/spring-boot-gradle-plugin/2.3.0.RELEASE
$ ./gradlew :examples:spring-boot-minimal:build
> Task :examples:spring-boot-minimal:bootJar FAILED

During the build, one or more dependencies that were declared without a version failed to resolve:

    org.jctools:jctools-core:
    org.hibernate.validator:hibernate-validator:
    io.netty:netty-handler-proxy:

    io.netty:netty-codec-haproxy:
    io.netty:netty-codec-http2:

    io.netty:netty-tcnative-boringssl-static:
    it.unimi.dsi:fastutil:
    ch.qos.logback:logback-classic:
    io.micrometer:micrometer-core:
    com.google.guava:guava:
    org.reactivestreams:reactive-streams:
    org.slf4j:slf4j-api:
    org.reflections:reflections:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-core:
    javax.inject:javax.inject:
    org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-actuator-autoconfigure:

    com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-annotations:
    com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:
    io.netty:netty-resolver-dns:
    org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-starter:
    io.netty:netty-transport:
    org.springframework.boot:spring-boot-autoconfigure:

Did you forget to apply the io.spring.dependency-management plugin to the spring-boot-minimal project?

commit.message: Delete dependency-management-plugin then add spring-boot-dependencies as dependency
